title: Breakers
synopsis: The anime will center on para-athletes who all meet an outcast sports scientist named Ren Narita. The anime will have four stories about four different sports: wheelchair basketball, track and high jump, goalball, and paralympic swimming.
voices: ['Tamagawa, Sakiko', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Okada, Yui', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Okano, Yuu', 'Miyake, Kenta', 'Miyagi, Kazuki', 'Miyake, Kenta', 'Hori, Soushirou', 'Yuzuki, Ryouka']
